sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has evaluated the Companys policies and practices of compensating its employees and has determined that they are not reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has reached this conclusion based in part on a review conducted by its independent consultant that analyzed he Companys compensation policies and practices for all employees, including executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee noted several aspects of the compensation programs that reduce the likelihood of excessive risk-taking:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation for the executive officers is a mix of fixed and variable awards, with share-based compensation that vests in accordance with both time- and performance-based criteria;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive officer annual incentive program is predominantly based on operating income, held at constant currency, which the Committee believes is closely tied to the creation of long-term shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance targets for executive officers, which are reviewed and approved by the Compensation Committee, are set in advance and potential payouts are stress tested to ensure a reasonable sharing of value created between management and Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial performance is audited by the Companys external auditors before amounts are paid out under the annual incentive program;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Combination of annually granted time-based restricted shares and performance-based restricted share units that vest over 3-year overlapping vesting periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This approach addresses longer tail risks as participants remain exposed to the risks associated with their decisions through their ongoing unvested awards;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term incentives are awarded in the form of whole share awards (instead of options), driving long-term share value creation, rather than rewarding share price volatility;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO and other executive officers, including all NEOs, are subject to share ownership requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company prohibits hedging of, and speculation in, Company shares by employees and Directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a clawback policy that applies to all employees who receive incentive awards and to all short- and long-term incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain repayment obligations may be triggered if there is a material restatement of the financial statements.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Signets compensation program is designed to attract, incentivize and retain the executive talent needed to achieve the Companys business vision: to be the world's premier jeweler by relentlessly connecting with customers, earning their trust with every interaction everywhere.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Signet must employ, motivate and retain superior management to accomplish corporate goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, total compensation is targeted at approximately the median of a custom group of comparator companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Those companies have been chosen to reflect various attributes similar to Signet and also because they may attempt to attract Signet executives if compensation is not competitive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executives are paid in a range around the median that is dependent upon, among other things, the executives experience, internal equity considerations and proven ability to consistently deliver superior performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total aggregate compensation at target performance for the NEOs in Fiscal 2017 fell below the comparator company median.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principles underlying Signet's executive compensation decisions are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. The compensation program must align the interests of senior management with those of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is achieved by delivering a significant portion of total compensation for executives as incentives dependent on factors that should reflect long-term growth in Shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. The only element of guaranteed pay is base salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The percentage of at-risk compensation increases in line with the responsibility and experience of each executive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Elements of compensation that are at risk should reward annual and multi-year exceptional performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Compensation should include a retention component to encourage high performing executives to remain with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. The compensation program should be constructed so that the NEOs understand and are motivated to achieve the performance required to receive various levels of payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. The compensation program should encourage all executive officers to build a substantial holding of the Companys
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DETERMINING EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committees objective is to deliver and maintain competitive executive compensation in accordance with its compensation principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee believes that the greater the responsibility and direct influence over the Companys performance an executive officer has, the more his or her total compensation should be weighted toward incentive payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee considers the annual compensation benchmarking data described earlier, along with other factors such as an executive officers level of experience, the Companys desire to retain the executive, the availability of replacement personnel, as well as the individuals responsibilities and actual performance when setting target compensation levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee also reviews tally sheets covering all elements of compensation including benefits, perquisites, and potential payments upon termination or change of control, to understand how each element of compensation relates to other elements and to the compensation package as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the beginning of each fiscal year, the CEO recommends total compensation levels (including salary, target bonus and target long-term incentive value) for the NEOs, other than for himself.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee considers these recommendations and determines final compensation levels for the NEOs as well as the CEO based on the factors described above.

sentences.text: (d) Retirement & Deferred Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company provides retirement and deferred compensation benefits to NEOs and employees, both as a retention mechanism and as a means to provide a degree of financial security post retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the U.S., there are two defined contribution savings vehicles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary retirement vehicle is the Company-sponsored Signet Jewelers 401(k) Retirement Savings Plan (the 401(k) Plan), which is a qualified plan under federal guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently the Company matches 50% of an employees elective salary deferral up to a maximum of 6% of the employees eligible compensation in order to be market competitive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual elective salary deferral for each employee is subject to certain maximum statutory limitations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under federal guidelines, the 401(k) Plan contributions by senior management may be reduced based on the participation evels of lower-paid employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, a supplemental plan, the Deferred Compensation Plan (the DCP), an unfunded, non-qualified plan under Federal guidelines, was established for senior management to assist with pre-tax retirement savings in addition to the 401(k) Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company provides a discretionary 50% matching contribution under he DCP for each participants annual deferral, up to 10% of the participants annual eligible compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the DCP also permits additional employer discretionary contributions, the Company did not make any additional discretionary contribution in Fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NEOs have benefits provided via the 401(k) Plan and the DCP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs participate in various health and welfare programs, as well as life insurance and long-term disability plans, which are generally available to other executive officers of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The only ongoing perquisite provided to executives is an executive physical.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (Relocation benefits are also provided where applicable and small retirement gifts may be given on occasion.)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee recently added the executive physical to facilitate and encourage executives to maintain their health.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in limited circumstances, where it is appropriate that spouses attend business related functions, Signet reimburses NEOs for the travel expenses of spouses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company does not provide any tax gross-up payments for any perquisites other than for relocation benefits where applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the Companys policy that executive officers build a holding of Common Shares.

sentences.text: The guidelines for these holdings for the NEOs and other executive officers are currently as follows:

sentences.text: It is the Companys policy to prohibit hedging or monetization transactions that would allow an officer, director or employee who is a security holder to engage in transactions that would separate the risks and rewards of ownership of Company securities from actual ownership of those securities.

sentences.text: In addition, the Company prohibits any pledging of Company stock by any officer, Director or employee of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code generally denies a federal income tax deduction to the Company for compensation in excess of $1 million per year paid to the principal executive officer and the next three most highly compensated officers (other than the principal financial officer).
